articles.title: 'He never did anything halfway': Montreal volunteer fighter dies in Ukraine, mother says - CBC.ca
articles.description: Émile-Antoine Roy-Sirois, 31, died on July 18, according to his friend, Adriel Martinez, an American volunteer in Ukraine. Roy-Sirois left Montreal in March to lend support to Ukrainian forces after the country was invaded by Russia.
articles.content:
Marie-France Sirois hadn't heard news about her son for days, until his best friend in the army called.
"I knew it was the end," she said.
Her son, Émile-Antoine Roy-Sirois, 31, died on July 18, ac… [+3084 chars]

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: Polio live oral vaccine: Here's why the US stopped using it years ago - New York Post
articles.description: The new case raises the issue of polio vaccinations — and what Americans should know to protect their health.
articles.content: An unvaccinated Rockland County, N.Y., resident exposed to an individual who received an oral poliovirus vaccine contracted the neurological disease and is now paralyzed, according to Rockland County… [+8096 chars]
